name: Microsoft Sync Center Suspicious Network Connections
description: Detects suspicious connections from Microsoft Sync Center to non-private IPs.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\mobsync.exe AND (NOT (destination.ip:(10.* OR 192.168.* OR 172.16.* OR 172.17.* OR 172.18.* OR 172.19.* OR 172.20.* OR 172.21.* OR 172.22.* OR 172.23.* OR 172.24.* OR 172.25.* OR 172.26.* OR 172.27.* OR 172.28.* OR 172.29.* OR 172.30.* OR 172.31.*) AND DestinationIsIpv6:false)))`
